avatar_decoration_configs.label: Green tropical leaves dripping with water droplets.
Delicate snowdrop flowers hang from green stems.
Circular glass window with green vines and leaves, featuring a small orange cat.
Glass dome filled with colourful succulents and small flowers.
Red and white spotted mushrooms with purple flowers form a decorative arch.
Purple wisteria and red blossoms cascade from the corner.
Angel-devil cat duo featuring a hot pink angel cat and a purple devil cat with bat wings.
Giggling rainbow cat skulls spewing a rainbow.
Explosive "RAWR!" in dripping pink paint with electric stars and hearts.
Vibrant, colorful accessories shimmer on purple hair.
Mini Goku with spiky black hair bouncing and orange gi fluttering.
Mini Vegeta with dark hair spiking up and blue armor gleaming.
Gomah with demon horns glowing and cape swaying.
Mini Piccolo with white turban flowing and green skin glowing.
Seven orange orbs floating with stars sparkling.
Shenron dragon with green whiskers flowing and body coiling.
Glorio with purple lightning crackling and energy swirling.
Mini Supreme Kai with rainbow aura pulsing and white hair shimmering.
Panzy with blonde hair and purple scarf flowing in the wind.
A neon array of green, pink, purple, and teal sparks circulate the avatar. They fade in and out in a dazzling display.
The full team of heroes, including The Thing, Human Torch, Invisible Woman, and Mr. Fantastic, circles the avatar in a coordinated loop.
Silver Surfer glides across the screen on his board, with planets orbiting behind him.
The Thing stomps forward, fists clenched, with rocky texture slamming the ground.
Invisible Woman glows and flickers between visible and invisible, projecting a force field.
Mr. Fantastic stretches his elongated arm around the avatar frame in a swooping arc.
Human Torch flies upward in a fiery spiral, leaving a glowing flame trail around the avatar.
An enchanting avatar with flowing fox-spirit tails, a duck floating in swirling water, and cherry blossoms  creating a mystical atmosphere.
A majestic blue dragon spirit enveloped in swirling purple spiritual flames with ethereal wisps dancing around it.
A tranquil duck floating peacefully in crystal-clear hot spring waters, surrounded by soft green mist.
A pair of purple shuriken crossed in an X pattern, surrounded by swirling violet spirit energy and dark shadow essence.
Teal-colored spirit energy with mystical water elements pulsates, surrounded by ancient markings.
A winged Morgana with a vengeful spirit, surrounded by glowing spirit blossoms and ethereal petals emanating from her wings.
A luminous pink and blue koi fish radiating spiritual energy in circular patterns, with an energy orb at its center.
A retro-style toilet appears around the avatar, with an NPC male character head bobbing and eventually getting flushed down the toilet bowl.
The ultimate boss, G-Toilet, surrounds the avatar and powers up, firing intense energy beams from a cluster of central weapons.
A professional camera rig encircles the avatar with green digital glitch effects and recording indicators.
A large pink speaker system surrounds the avatar with pulsing sound waves and bass vibrations.
A retro TV launches like a rocket, soars into orbit around the avatar, then returns with a burst of static and fun emoji face effects.
Massive mechanical armor plates grind into place around the avatar, gears clanking as glowing red eyes light up.
An adorable duck cheerfully dips its head underwater with carefree joy around the avatar, occasionally letting out a happy little quack!
A large rainbow bubble encases the avatar, reflecting the shine of the sunlight
Luminous fireflies float in gentle circles around the avatar, their delicate pink and golden glow casting a serene ambiance across the grassy meadow.
A refreshing pink juice box with a striped pink straw playfully swishes and swooshes around the avatar, creating bubbly juice.
Bright golden sunflowers gently hug the avatar, their petals dancing in a warm summer breeze.
A woven straw sun hat with a blue flowing ribbon rests atop the avatar, its brim gently swaying in the perfect beach day breeze.
Six glowing purple dice orbit the avatar. A beam of light strikes through all of them, causing them to spin and shimmer with sparkles of magic.
Six glowing azure dice orbit the avatar. A beam of light strikes through all of them, causing them to spin and shimmer with sparkles of magic.
On its back, an adorable, playful baby displacer beast swings and plays with its tentacle barbs. Be careful when it grows up!
A delicately pruned cybernetic pink bonsai tree adorns your avatar.
Futuristic skyscrapers and Japanese temples glow with bright city lights, with cybernetic cherry blossoms in view.
Your avatar wears a cybernetic jingasa that comes equipped with a holographic UI overlay.
A hologram dragon coils and wraps around your avatar.
Your avatar skillfully wields a katana to prune a neat line of bonsai leaves.
A high tech oni mask glitches and flickers into effect, taking you into ghost-mode.
A gilded frame glows with the White Mana symbol as angelic wings and sunbeams illuminate your avatar.
The Blue Mana symbol embedded in your avatar glows with power as it summons swirls of arcane energy.
Purple flames and skeletal hands grasp your Black Mana-framed avatar, emitting necrotic energy.
Dragon wings and red lightning erupt from your avatar's Red Mana symbol.
Rampant vines grow and frame your avatar, emanating from your powerful Green Mana symbol.
Your avatar wears Deku's mask.
Your avatar wears Bakugo's headgear and gauntlets.
A mini version of Shigaraki stands next to your avatar activating his 'Decay' Quirk.
Your avatar wears Ochaco's headgear.
Shoto's quirk causes ice and flames to encase your avatar.
Your avatar wears Endeavor's shoulder pads which is heated by his flames.
Hawks' feathers fly around and frame your avatar.
A mini version of All Might stands next to your avatar, pumping his left fist into the air in a heroic pose.
Young crops grow as a watering can tends to them.
A fisher cat in a small boat reels in a fish for dinner!
The local village baker bear shows off today's delicious batch of pastries.
A happy frog enjoys the shade of a giant leaf that catches dew droplets from above.
A busy bee takes a quick nap on vibrant spring flowers.
A blue and red lightsaber spar with each other, casting glows with every clash.
A green and red lightsaber spar with each other, casting glows with every clash.
The Millennium Falcon flies around in space and prepares to jump into hyperspace.
R2-D2 rolls through Tatooine sands around your avatar.
BB-8 playfully peeks around from behind your avatar.
Yoda and rocks levitate on Dagobah.
X-Wing and TIE Fighters battle each other in space.
Your avatar takes a big huff from a mask attached to a copium gas tank.
Mashing a black F key with enthusiastic little pats of respect.
Mashing a white F key with enthusiastic little pats of respect.
Your avatar sits dejectedly in a trash can. A banana peel lands on your head, delivering the final humiliation.
A fresh patch of grass sitting atop your avatar, reminding you to take breaks here and there.
Your avatar emitting a smug "SKILL ISSUE" speech bubble, dripping with sarcasm.
Your avatar lets out a gloating "GGEZ" speech bubble, as if you weren't sweating the whole time.
Your avatar lets out a speech bubble full of "???????" in reaction to the in-game catastrophe you've just witnessed.
A piece of bread with cute doggy features and a charming pink bow tie frames your avatar.
A cute white bunny peacefully munches on fresh red strawberries next to your avatar.
The adorable orange hamster, Nibbles, happily nibbles your avatar. Looks like you're the dessert.
Your avatar is framed by a cow donut, its face hilariously reacting to being tickled with each bite.
Your avatar is framed by a pink cat donut, its face hilariously responding to being tickled with each bite.
Your avatar is framed by a brown bear donut, its face hilariously reacting to being tickled with each bite.
A frog-shaped ice cream plopped happily atop your avatar. Its cone comes wrapped in a pink bow tie for that added sweet touch.
A jelly bear parfait encapsulates your entire avatar, jiggling happily and waiting to be eaten.
An excited cat nomming your avatar. Looks like you're the chew toy.
Your avatar is snugly tucked inside a crispy chicken nugget.
A beautiful brown egg. And then there's you.
A toilet flushes water over your likeness. At least you're clean now.
Your avatar is blushing with hands on cheeks and feet in the air.
A buffering icon spinning over your forehead... this might take a while.
Karina’s signature heart symbol glows around your avatar. Her Rocket Puncher attack strikes the screen and releases a flurry of hearts upon impact.
Giselle’s fuchsia moon symbol frames your avatar. Her Frame of Light ability casts a glowing, translucent energy ring.
Winter's signature star symbol frames your avatar. Her sword emerges and slices through the air, creating a frosty trail of snowflakes.
Ningning’s yellow butterfly symbol frames your avatar. Three digital butterflies fly into view from a futuristic HUD interface.
A futuristic portal opens, revealing aespa's logo and each member’s signature symbol.
A glowing lightstick containing aespa's logo and each members’ symbols inside, a must-have keepsake for aespa fans around the world.
Two glowing celestial whales playfully swim in a circle around your avatar, leaving trails of sparkling particles behind them.
Pink ethereal streaks and rings of light flow around your avatar like an aurora, emitting trails of shimmering particles.
Glowing, metallic liquid-like blobs drift around your avatar, mimicking the mesmerizing flow of a lava lamp.
Eight glowing flowers with purple petals and blue centers frame your avatar. The petals bloom and close, one after the other, in a mesmerizing rhythmic sequence.
Colorful glowing animals, including a frog, sheep, squirrel, and cat, form a whimsical ring around your avatar, as if in a magical trance.
Magical purple energy encircles your avatar, with sparkling pink stars and hearts swirling around in a cyclone-like dance.
Hearts and flowers decorate the avatar's frame for a lovely, charming vibe.
Bold 'zuzun' characters and dynamic, wavy lines creating a vibrant rumbling effect around your avatar.
Your avatar dons a cute and classic Japanese school uniform with a green collar and red tie. Pink sakura blossoms crown your head for a dreamy look.
You find yourself enveloped in fluffy white rice, with a gorgeous slab of orange sashimi perched atop your head. It appears you are a sushi roll.
Pink and red roses frame your avatar, occasionally shedding petals that gently flutter like Valentine confetti.
Blue roses frame your avatar, occasionally shedding petals that gently flutter like confetti.
Heart-shaped string lights wrap your avatar in the shape of a heart, each bulb shining in turn, creating a fun light show of pink and red.
Heart-shaped string lights wrap your avatar in the shape of a heart, each bulb shining in turn, creating a fun blue light show.
Your avatar is dressed as an angel with fluffy angel wings and a glowing halo. Every flutter of your wings releases sparkles and little hearts.
Your avatar is dressed as a mischievous red devil with devilish wings, horns, and a heart-tipped tail. Every flutter of your wings releases hearts ignited in blue flames.
A cute pink bunny with tiny angel wings draws its bow and fires a heart-tipped arrow into the distance. You can't help but wonder where the arrow is headed...
A pink heart bubble engulfs your avatar. Suddenly, a heart-tipped arrow from out of nowhere pops the bubble, releasing a flurry of heart bubbles. You can't help but wonder who fired the arrow...
Glittering ruby hearts surround your avatar, each heart shimmering with sparkles and shine like gems.
A hex tile made of gold outlines your avatar like a glorious portrait frame.
Your avatar’s hex tile morphs through desert, lush forests, and oceanic blues - perfect for those who love to explore.
Desert, forest, and sea hex tiles frame your avatar, capturing the variety and wonder of your growing civilization.
A regal laurel wreath of gold encircles your avatar, symbolizing the grandeur of civilization's mightiest rulers.
Fortified stone walls encircle and protect your avatar in the shape of a hex, each corner alight with torches of fire.
All that stands between you and your future is this glorious, golden 'Next Turn' button - go on, make your move.
A red snake in lunar year colors coils gracefully around your avatar for a scaly hug.
Two koi fish swimming beneath the water covering the avatar surface, and dive down repeatedly as they swim in circles.
A string of firecrackers appears to the left of the avatar, and after a moment, lights off with a flurry of sparks!
Two red envelopes sit on the left side of the avatar. One envelope moves forward and opens up to ingest a number of gold coins.
Delicate petals of a beautiful pink lotus flower bloom around your avatar.
An ornamental red new year lantern frames your avatar, symbolizing good luck and joy for your year ahead.
A fan sits to the left of the avatar with plum blossoms. The fan expands for a moment, shielding the avatar from your gaze, before closing with an acrobatic movement.
From on top of the avatar, a tiled roof sits with lanterns swinging back and forth in the breeze.
A dragon's mouth perches precariously around the avatar. In a swift movement, the dragon chomps down, smiling and revealing its face.
Your avatar wears a stylish pair of cat ears and goggles with glass lenses. The ears and lenses flick and twitch mechanically, as if scanning your surroundings.
Mechanical blossoms with blue-and-white petals swivel and unfold, releasing gentle puffs of steam each time they bloom.
A fashionable purple bowler hat with mechanical gears and eyes sprouts four spider-like legs, then runs a jaunty lap around your avatar before perching again.
Antique headphones constructed from golden-copper clockwork gears and tubes plays music, emitting wispy puffs of steam from its earmuffs in tune with the beat.
An antique, computer-like clock said to be capable of time travel encircles the avatar, complete with a vintage keyboard and a neon-green digital display.
Your avatar is sealed within a lab-like glass container surrounded with tubing that trickles a purple concoction into your enclosure, each droplet releasing a soft plume of curious, purple gas.
Three glowing pink fairy sprites flutter energetically around your avatar. Each flap of their tiny wings emits a sprinkle of sparkles.
Three glowing blue fairy sprites flutter energetically around your avatar. Each flap of their tiny wings emits a sprinkle of sparkles.
A purple portal edged with swirling, magical energy opens around your avatar, teasing its gateway to unknown realms.
A blue portal edged with swiriling, magical energy opens around your avatar, teasing its gateway to unknown realms.
Three glowing fuchsia pink mushrooms sway gently by your avatar, their soft light hinting to their secret woodland, magical properties.
Three glowing blue mushrooms sway gently by your avatar, their soft light hinting to their secret woodland, magical properties.
A cozy cottage home with a well-kept grassy roof and doorside lanterns frames your avatar.
Three Fairy Sprites, Floating and Shining, Yellow, Animated
Curved Sword with Pink Gem Engraved in Hilt, Alight with Orange Flames, Animated
Round Glass Bottle with Cork, Bursting with Purple Potion, Animated
Wizard's Staff with Green Gem, Summoning a Branch of Green Crystals, Animated
Circle of Blue Rune Stones, Glowing and Pulsing, Animated
Shield with Blue Gem Below a Branch of Green Leaves, Resting Against a Stone, Catching Arrows, Animated
Skull Medallion Hanging from Pink Band, Rotating and Activating with Energy, Animated
Gold Key with Red Gem, Unlocking a Treasure Chest Filled with Gold Coins, Animated
Colorful polar lights in hues of pink, orange, cyan, and fuschia and twinkling stars shimmer over your avatar.
Festive string lights wrap around the profile photo, twinkling into the night.
Festive green and blue string lights wrap around the profile photo, twinkling into the night.
Festive red and orange string lights wrap around the profile photo, twinkling into the night.
Festive blue and yellow string lights wrap around the profile photo, twinkling into the night.
Festive red, blue, and yellow string lights wrap around the profile photo, twinkling into the night.
Your avatar wears a cute polar bear hat that has a sniffly nose. A droplet dribbles from the polar bear's nose but it sniffs it back up just in time - whew.
The avatar wears Lofi Girl's signature red scarf while listening to lofi music playing from lofi-branded headphones, mastering the 'chill and cozy' look.
Lofi Girl's friendly orange cat companion lies happily on its back, hugging your avatar on its belly, eyes closed as it playfully gnaws on your avatar like a chew toy.
Lofi Girl's iconic study desk lamp shines its light on a pen scribbling notes onto a notebook. Her red-striped cup filled with pencils sits nearby, all guarded by her loyal moose plushie.
Lofi Girl's sleepy cow companion dozes on top of your avatar, orange headphones fitted snugly on its head while snoozing out Zzz's, probably dreaming of mellow beats.
Mochi, Froggy, and Birdie - Lofi Girl's friendly plushie study companions - hang out excitedly around your avatar while giving big hugs.
Flower clouds gently sway around the avatar, adding a lovely Bikini Bottom ambiance.
The avatar wears SpongeBob's signature outfit while twirling a spatula with ease, ready to cook up some Krabby Pattys.
Patrick clumsily hammers down a nail into a plank taped to his forehead. No one knows what he's trying to accomplish but he's trying his best.
The avatar dons Sandy Cheek's stylish underwater helmet, with air bubbles rising around it. Don't forget to refill the oxygen tank.
Gary the Snail stretches his long eyes to take a quick peek outside from SpongeBob's window.
SpongeBob spreads his hands wide, revealing a glorious rainbow above the avatar. You can practically hear him say "Imagination."
The avatar, now blessed with the remarkable arms of MuscleBob BuffPants, flexes off its muscles and hard-earned gains.
A cuddly pink bunny plopped comfortably atop the avatar is awoken by sounds coming from a nearby matching pink bunny microphone. The bunny frets not and resumes slumber.
The avatar looks as sweet as ever as it sits inside a plastic cup of delicious pink bubble tea filled with vibrant, purple pearls. A brightly colored straw is poked into the top of the lid.
The avatar wears a snug pink headset with cat ears, perfect for those cozy gaming vibes.
Atop the avatar sits an adorably tiny green sprout that dances and wiggles happily from side to side, emitting sparkles of joy.
Atop the avatar sits an adorably tiny purple flower that dances and wiggles happily from side to side, emitting sparkles of joy.
Peach, carrot, cherry, and bunny-shared wall lights decorate the avatar's frame, illuminating it with a cute, neon charm.
A cute blue arcade screen encases the avatar, complete with bright pink controls and an adorable retro gaming vibe.
Hexagon-shaped lights in red, green, blue, and white colors decorate the outer frame of the avatar, creating a sleek, high-tech gaming look.
The mysterious Anomaly has taken over your avatar, its weblike surface stretching and wrapping around it endlessly.
A circle of black rose petals bloom over the avatar, then smolder away in flames. The Black Rose sends their regards.
The avatar dons Jinx's signature hairstyle. Flashing grafiti create the illusion as if Jinx was making mischievous faces over your likeness.
Vi's gauntlets flex their fingers before charging up and throwing out a punch with tremendous force.
Three of Jinx's flame chompers jitter with anticipation around the avatar, ready to snap and blast anyone who dares to step close by.
Fishbones' metallic jaws clamp down around the avatar as it charges up and unleashes an explosive blast of powerful energy.
The avatar finds itself encased inside the Hexcore, its runic fragments twisting and swirling about, crackling with hextech energy.
A shimmer-infused mechanical device is encased over the avatar, injecting two vials of shimmer into the avatar for a charged-up transformation.
The avatar wears the ears and fluffy tails of a mystical kitsune. Its vibrant furs are splashed in fiery fuchsia pinks, whites, and purples.
Two magical, glowing fairies flutter around the avatar, dancing playfully with each other in the air.
Two elegant mermaids swim gracefully around the avatar in a mesmerizing dance.
The avatar wears the horn, ears, and mane of an enchanted unicorn. Ripples of magic flow and shimmer across its mane.
Fiery phoenix wings conjoin at the bottom of the avatar. Bursts of flame surge across the wings as they gently ruffle around.
Antlers from a mystical crystal elk crown the avatar. The antlers shimmer with the magic of ancient snowstorms from winters past.
With Ryu's hair and iconic red headband, the avatar brings its hands together to charge up and fire his signature ki blast.
With Akuma's beard and sinister wisps of demon energy, the avatar transforms into a fierce warrior, ready to unleash destruction.
The avatar dons M. Bison's signature cap while summoning menacing purple energy orbs that radiate dark power from each of his hands.
The avatar dons Chun-Li's signature odango buns, as a whirlwind of strikes leaves behind a dazzling trail of blue streaks.
Ken's wild blond hair and curled hands decorate the avatar. The hands begin to motion and carry out Ken's legendary Shoryuken uppercut move.
Cammy's beret and braids adorn the avatar, instilling Cammy's iconic fierce look and warrior spirit.
Guile's iconic flattop haircut and dog tags decorate the avatar, firing off his powerful sonic attack that creating a ring of energy.
Juri's signature gothic hairstyle and spiked choker adorn the avatar, with her foot suddenly appearing and giving a cheeky, playful wave.

The avatar is decorated with sprouted and blooming chrysanthemums that continuously change from pink to blue as a pair of glowing butterflies - one blue and the other pink as well - encircle the avatar.
The avatar is surrounded by a rotating streak of light that starts off with the fiery red of the sun and smoothly transitions into the tranquil midnight blue of the moon.
A crown of red, yellow, and orange autumn flowers sit atop the avatar, displaying the rich colors and warmth of autumn.
Different phases of the moon are plotted around the avatar's frame, each one beautifully illuminating with shifting lights and shadows.
Chestnut autumn leaves and acorns decorate the avatar. You can practically smell the acorns dangling above. Fall is here.
Scarlet autumn leaves and acorns decorate the avatar. You can practically smell the acorns dangling above. Fall is here.
Green, yellow, and brown, autumn leaves and two acorns decorate the avatar. You can practically smell the acorns dangling above. Fall is here.
Orange pumpkins growing from a vine can only mean one thing... the flavor of fall - pumpkin spice - has arrived!
Mushrooms are growing underneath a cute green hat that looks suspiciously like a live, smiling frog.
A strange humanoid-looking creature farts, then smells its own stinky fumes. Guess that's why its earned the name Stinkums...
Toast Being Eaten, Animated
The avatar is framed with a piece of burnt toast. Despite its condition, the toast gets gobbled up in a few bites. Why would anyone re-toast their toast?
The petals of three lovely, light pink cherry blossoms drift softly across the avatar.
The petals of three lovely, pink cherry blossoms drift softly across the avatar.
The petals of three lovely, yellow cherry blossoms drift softly across the avatar.
The petals of three lovely, green cherry blossoms drift softly across the avatar.
An upset frog with a scowling expression sits atop the avatar while a spring lilypad floats calmly beneath the avatar. Guess someone ate all the bugs around here...
A blissfully happy frog sits atop the avatar with its tongue playfully poking out of its mouth for an adorably derpy expression, while a spring lilypad floats calmly beneath the avatar.
Runny Egg Yolk, Animated
An arguably fresh, green fried egg with runny yolk sits and wiggles atop the avatar - if only there were some ham to go with it.
Coffee with Milk Steaming from Blue Mug with Smiley Face, Animated
A green goblin variation of Stinkums, an adorably hideous creature with a large round nose and an even bigger behind, lets out a gaseous fart before sniffing the fumes, disturbingly unbothered.
Cherry blossoms fall gently from a sakura tree, both beautifully etched in ink around the avatar.
An avatar donning a straw hat tilts its head down dramatically under drizzling rain. Cue the boss music.
A crimson kabuto helmet gleams with a pristine shine, ready for its warrior to wear it into battle.
A demon Oni mask breathes out smoky fumes, adding to its fearsome and ominous look.
An avatar wields two katanas surrounded by cherry blossoms, gesturing for a clashing of steel.
Two shurikens thrown with deadly precision fly swiftly through the air before sticking into their target.
Metallic vines and thorns tightly wrap and writhe around the avatar. A metallic symbol shaped after the VALORANT Champions Tour logo then appears before being absorbed into the avatar's center.
Agent Yoru's hands appear, ripping open a new dimension over your avatar that lets him drift between dimensions, unable to be detected by enemies and even yourself.
A kill icon displaying 5 confirmed kills.
Viper's poison cloud ability surrounds the avatar. Hope you brought a mask.
The avatar wears Cypher's signature hat, cleverly disguised as an intel device that can reveal the location of your enemies.
Clove's special smoke ability wraps around the avatar, with several fluttering, glowing butterflies.
The avatar wears Omen's signature hood.
Reyna's Leer ability surrounds the avatar, nearsighting all those who dare to stare into its gaze.
The avatar equips throwing knives from Jett's signature Blade Storm ability.
Wisps of luminous, ethereal embers swirl around the avatar. They make for a helpful lightsource for dark areas yet to be explored.
A circular sigil inscribed with mysterious symbols enframed around the avatar glows with a magical energy.
A midnight-blue diadem adorned with a glowing enchanted gem in the center. As the gem glows, it emits a magical shimmer throughout the diadem.
A sinister crown with sharp ornamental spikes and a glowing jewel engraved in its center. The jewel emits a dark energy across the crown that grants the wearer incredible power and style points.
A fearsome razor-edged sword with mysterious symbols engraved across its blade radiates with a dark and electrical power from tip to hilt.
A cursed ring covered with shadowy roots and enveloped in flickering cursed flames. It may grant its wearer new powers, but at what cost?
Chillet embraces you with a frosty hug that nevertheless warms the heart.
With a playful snap, the Pal Sphere opens up and captures the avatar.
An avatar wears Cattiva's adorably fierce facial features, ready to scratch at viewers.
As a fluffy ball of fun, Lamball whimsically rolls on and on before tumbling into dizziness.
Depresso, with a tiny pickaxe in hand, diligently mines for resources, showing what it truly means to work hard with enthusiasm.
A purple crescent moon adorns the avatar, when suddenly the glaring red eyes of a new, mysterious Pal stare into the depths of your soul. Who could it be...?
A circular pipe rapidly shoots out a cascade of colorful stars from one end to the other in an endless loop. Anyone who stares for too long may get starry-eyed.
A joystick wobbles back and forth accompanied by what must be some serious combo-breaking button mashing.
One small but mighty fightership in space blasts some pesky invaders that are shaped like Clyde to guarantee the safety of the universe for another day.
A basketball in flames soars into the hoop, netting 3 points.
Cute bunny Mallow successfully jumps across tall pillars of land with 3 lives remaining - hop with care.
A pixelated snake slithers into view, gobbling up pieces of fruit until it accidentally gobbles its own tail for an unfortunate game over.
A digital face in an electronic device licks its lips.
A digital face in an electronic device displaying an awestruck smile.
A digital face in an electronic device panics at the thought of being challenged to a spontaneous rap battle.
A digital face in an electronic device sweats with nervousness.
Armed with two sharpened cutlasses and a pirate captain's hat, your avatar is ready to outwit, outmatch, and outsyle any scallywag who dares stand in your way.
The avatar wears a stylish polka-dotted headscarf, a must-have fashion piece for any pirate who yearns for a life at sea.
Perched neatly on a branch of wood sits Pepper, a proud parrot donned in only the most fashionable of pirate apparel.
A pair of crossbones frames the avatar. One cannot help but wonder who they once belonged to...
Two loaded cannons fire their shots at their target. If their aim be true, their foes will dine with the fishes!
Your avatar is transformed into a wooden pirate ship wheel embedded with a skull emblem, with your likeness steering starboard.
Star constellations decorate the avatar, inviting profile admirers for a fun session of stargazing.
A glittering ring of colorful stardust adorns the avatar with a celestial touch.
A mesmerizing dark hole swirls around the avatar, drawing everyone into its mysterious depths.
Three planets orbit around an avatar engulfed by solar flames.
A UFO appears and emits an abduction beam before flying away... talk about a grab-and-go.
The avatar wears an astronaut helmet. Protecting your head is always a good look.
Stringlights and a lovely houseplant adorn the frame of the avatar for the ultimate cozy mood.
Waves of color pulsate around the avatar to the tempo of lo-fi hip hop beats.
An adorable cat sleeps peacefully on the avatar.
Raindrops sprinkle outside of the avatar through a window's view for a calming ambiance.
An avatar wearing a pair of stylish headphones.
A pen scribbles a cheeky smiley face on a small notebook next to a pair of earbuds.
Two butterflies flutter around the avatar, eager to adventure with you to the nearest garden.
A jubilant bee buzzes around an avatar adorned with lush petals. We must protect them at all costs.
A pair of fluffy dandelions have their florets dispersed by a gentle breeze.
A living rainbow suddently loses its colorful hues and unleashes a stormy lament.
Three happy strawberries are hanging out together on a vine, when suddenly one of them breaks free for a sweet escape.
Three merry flowerheads are quite entertained by the gentle descent of petals around them.
Fire, rock, water, and electricity revolve around the avatar's frame.
Three fireballs revolve around the avatar's frame, then combine together to engulf the avatar in flames.
Droplets and streaks of water dance and swirl around the avatar.
A sphere of gusting wind swirls around the avatar.
A large chunk of earthly rock is split into five smaller chunks.
A streak of electricity jolts around the avatar, releasing streaks of energy.
Something disrupted the neurovisor connection. The signal appears as static over the avatar. Better call Repairs.
A glowing neon HUD overlays the avatar, locking on to a target.
After booting up, a wave of neon colors transforms into a sunset that embraces this avatar. Why do I suddenly feel calmer?
A surge of energy pulses through wires perched on top of this avatar. Electricity dangerously crackles over the image. Be careful with this one!
Beamchop, a horned monster, musters its might to fire a powerful laser from its horn. That looks like it hurts!
Chuck, a round monster with a giant mouth, covers its mouth before suddenly spewing a powerful stream of vomit. There's not enough mouthwash in the world...
A one-eyed creature blows a giant heart around the avatar, then squezes the heart until it pops. Talk about a great hugger!
Chewbert, a spherical monster, casually chews bubble gum and blows sizable bubbles with it. How come my bubbles are never as big?
A lizard crawls over the avatar, leaving a trail of slime. This calls for a shower.
An 8-eyed cephalopod with goo in its mouth stares menacingly. It's chewing something. I don't even want to know what it is.
An unassuming fly suddenly gets caught by the inescapable tongue of a frog-looking spider. Alas, Gawblehop has claimed another prey.
Cheers to 2023, and we hope you have a wonderful new year in 2024! Gold 2024 balloons sit ontop of the avatar.
A pine branch crown made of acorns, cones, and pine branches sprinkled with snow decorates this user's profile. Winter is here
The avatar is trapped in a snowglobe. Don't ask me how to get it out.
Bathed in the glow of a full moon, a mysterious black cat is perched upon a tombstone, playfully pawing the tomb's exterior.
You notice two spooky ghosts twirling around each other in an eternal dance. Are they friend or foe?
A one-eyed magic cauldron hovers in the air, bubbling with a strange, green brew. Its winged jack-o'-lantern companion flaps nearby. What mischief are they brewing?
A gleeful jack-o'-lantern cackles atop a dark, twisted branch, with bats swirling above to join in on the spooky shenanigans.
The avatar wears a cute, orange fox hat! Wait... did the hat just blink?!
